options.name: args
options.description: Additional arguments appended to the ruff invocation.

options.name: config
options.description: Specific ruff configuration file to use.

options.name: exclude
options.description: Paths or globs that ruff should exclude.

options.name: extend-exclude
options.description: Additional exclusion patterns applied after defaults.

options.name: extend-ignore
options.description: Extend the default ignored codes for the project.

options.name: extend-select
options.description: Extend the default selection with additional rule codes.

options.name: fix
options.description: Enable --fix when running the lint action.

options.name: ignore
options.description: Ignore the listed ruff rule codes.

options.name: per-file-ignores
options.description: List of pattern:codes entries for per-file ignores.

options.name: respect-gitignore
options.description: Whether to honour .gitignore patterns during linting.

options.name: select
options.description: Restrict linting to the provided ruff rule codes.

options.name: target-version
options.description: Python version passed to ruff (e.g. py311).

options.name: unsafe-fixes
options.description: Allow fix actions that may alter runtime semantics.
